overview:
Sargas Capital specializes in the acquisition, development and commercialization of technologies that have the potential to secure dominant market position in high growth industries. We look for technologies that are innovative, original, proprietary, scalable and that have a potential enterprise value, when commercialized, of â‚¬100 million or more. Sargas acquires early stage technologies and invests in their development and commercialization. We also enter into strategic partnerships to co-develop and finance game changing technologies.

Sargas believes that there is opportunity now, during this financial unease, to acquire or partner with companies at minimal costs due to capital funding constraints. Even though many companies face these funding constraints, the most recent technology IPOs in the Internet and social networking space have proven that innovation is as vibrant as ever. Sargas offers investors the chance to participate in high growth ideas by creating funding opportunities for early stages investments.
